_description: This file controls default values for the trading interface. Copy to trading_defaults.json and modify as needed.

trading_defaults._comment: Global default values used across all trading operations
trading_defaults._symbol_comment: Default trading symbol (e.g., NQ, ES, CL)
trading_defaults._quantity_comment: Default number of contracts to trade
trading_defaults._stop_loss_comment: Default stop loss distance in ticks
trading_defaults._take_profit_comment: Default take profit distance in ticks (calculated as stop_loss_ticks * risk_reward_ratio)
trading_defaults._risk_reward_comment: Risk/reward ratio used for auto-calculating TP from SL
trading_defaults._enable_tp_comment: Whether take profit is enabled by default
trading_defaults._enable_sl_comment: Whether stop loss is enabled by default

symbol_defaults._comment: Per-symbol default settings. When a symbol is selected, these values override the global defaults
